Based on the user's preferences and the information provided, I would recommend "Divergent".
This movie falls into the genre of science fiction/drama, which the user seems to enjoy.
The plot of "Divergent" centers around a young woman named Tris Prior who is part of a group known as Abnegation.
Tris learns that she is Divergent, meaning she has no single virtue like the other members of Abnegation.
This revelation puts Tris in a difficult situation, and she must decide whether to stay within Abnegation or to seek out those who share her unique set of virtues.
Overall, "Divergent" is an engaging and thought-provoking science fiction/drama movie that tells an intriguing story about Divergence and its consequences.
